title: Cape Fear
creator_credit: John D. MacDonald, Barbara De Fina, Wesley Strick, Rita Ryack, Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Henry Bumstead, Tribeca Productions, Cappa Productions, Amblin Entertainment and Universal Pictures
brief_description: Sam Bowden is a small-town corporate attorney. Max Cady is a tattooed, cigar-smoking, bible-quoting, psychopath. Their worlds collide in this remake of the original by Martin Scorsese.

constellations_other.name: Movies in movies in a movie museum
constellations_other.description: The 400 Porto-Arc 16mm projector used the first electric light ever invented, which was perfectly suited for movie projectors. This Constellation explores the movies where characters go to the movies, by two movie-obsessed directors.

creator_credit_for_label: John D. MacDonald, Barbara De Fina, Wesley Strick, Rita Ryack, Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Henry Bumstead, Tribeca Productions, Cappa Productions, Amblin Entertainment and Universal Pictures
description: Sam Bowden is a small-town corporate attorney. Max Cady is a tattooed, cigar-smoking, bible-quoting, psychotic rapist. What do they have in common? Fourteen years ago, Sam was a public defender assigned to Max Cady’s rape trial, and he made a serious error: he hid a document from his illiterate client that could have gotten him acquitted. Now, the cagey, bibliophile Cady has been released, and he intends to teach Sam Bowden and his family a thing or two about loss.
